ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: Text description about the reaction as a whole, including details of the manifestation if required.

ivardefs.name: exposureRoute
ivardefs.desc: Identification of the route by which the subject was exposed to the substance.

ivardefs.name: manifestation_
ivardefs.desc: Clinical symptoms and/or signs that are observed or associated with the adverse reaction event.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Additional text about the adverse reaction event not captured in other fields.

ivardefs.name: onset
ivardefs.desc: Record of the date and/or time of the onset of the Reaction.

ivardefs.name: severity
ivardefs.desc: Clinical assessment of the severity of the reaction event as a whole, potentially considering multiple different manifestations.

ivardefs.name: substance
ivardefs.desc: Identification of the specific substance (or pharmaceutical product) considered to be responsible for the Adverse Reaction event. Note: the substance for a specific reaction may be different from the substance identified as the cause of the risk, but it m

properties.desc: Details about each adverse reaction event linked to exposure to the identified substance.
